mapper.select:
SELECT i.*,dj, sl, zysje, xz_19, dy_18, yzf, p.xm AS "xm",c.lb,d.bmmc,s.gysmc FROM bss_project_info i LEFT JOIN bss_project_price pr ON i.id=pr.project_id LEFT JOIN bss_project_person p ON i.fzr=p.id LEFT JOIN bss_project_class c ON i.xmfl=c.id LEFT JOIN bss_cost_department d ON i.fygsbm=d.id LEFT JOIN bss_supplier s ON i.gys=s.id
i.id = #{projectid}
mapper.delete:
delete from bss_project_info where id in
#{arr}
